data.name: Toricky - OST by Hiroki Kikuta & Dale North
data.detailed_description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/477720/

Toricky - OST by Hiroki Kikuta & Dale North


12 tracks of the original music composed by Hiroki Kikuta & Dale North.

Dale North, a talented composer for video games and digital media based in San Francisco,

Hiroki Kikuta, the legendary composer of Secret of Mana, who also worked on many other famous games like Soul Calibur V or SEGA's Shining Series.

Songs will be placed in your Toricky folder in the Steam Directory :

PC \Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Toricky\Soundtrack

It contains 12 tracks:

01_Treasures beyond the Sky
02_Title Theme
03_Where the Crystars Shine (Dim)
04_Crystars Saved
05_Challenging Heavens
06_Inpenetrenable Walls in the Heavens
07_Where the Crystars Shine (Warm)
08_Palmtrees in the Heavens
09_Moonlight Labyrinth
10_Karakuri the Crazy Machine
11_Call from the Ancient Times
12_Where the Crystars Shine (Bright)

Enjoy!

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese-Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible All Video card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or greater
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible All Video card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible All Video card
